price: Yã Banĩ Isrã'ĩla! Ku* tuna ni'imaTa wadda Na ni'imtar da ita a kanku, kuma lalle ne Nĩ, Nã fĩfĩtã ku a kan tãlikai.
arabic: يَٰبَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ ٱذۡكُرُواْ نِعۡمَتِيَ ٱلَّتِيٓ أَنۡعَمۡتُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ وَأَنِّي فَضَّلۡتُكُمۡ عَلَى ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ
footnotes: * Kira na ƙarshe zuwa ga Yahũdu dõmin shiga Musulunci. An biyar da gargaɗi gare su da tunãtar da su cewa wannan addinin fa, shi ne addinin kãkansu Ibrãhim, dõmin kada su fanɗare daga addinin ubanninsu na ƙwarai. Kuma sunã da lãbãrin ginin Ɗakin Ka'aba da addu'ar da lbrahim ya yi alõkacin, wadda ta ƙunshi zuwan annabi daga cikin zuriyar Isama'ila a Makka, watau Fãrãna.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yābanī is'rāīla udh'kurū niʿ'matiya allatī anʿamtu ʿalaykum wa-annī faḍḍaltukum ʿalā al-ʿālamīna
